Get the subscription plan of the user.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully retrieved plan.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"address":{"type":"string","description":"The address of the user."},"plan":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the subscription plan."},"quota":{"type":"number","description":"The quota of the subscription plan."},"quotaUsed":{"type":"number","description":"The quota used of the subscription plan."},"expiresAt":{"type":"string","description":"The expiration timestamp of the subscription plan."}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"401":{"description":"User subscription not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
